title: [GAMEPLAY] Darkflame Shyvana, Popstar Ahri, Rek'sai
body: While in game a visual bug occurs with Darkflame Shyvana's Q creating boxes around her hands, Popstar Ahri's Orb and her Q seeming to be invisible, and Rek' Sai's tunnles flashing white.

replies.body:
Hey FlameScarred, 

Thanks for the report! 

We're currently aware of the issue regarding Darkflame Shyvana and Rek'Sai's tunnels and are working on fixes. We'll take a look at Popstar Ahri's orb.
